content.text: I'm doing well, thank you! How about you?
I'm doing good as well! I'm a computer programmer, and I make over $200,000 per year. I also have two pitt bulls, and I like to donate time and money to charity.
Wow, that's amazing! I'm a female, and I have a master's degree. I love to swim, and I started at a young age. My favorite color is purple, and my favorite singer is Kid Rock.
That's really cool! I love swimming too, but I'm not very good at it. I'm more of a runner. What kind of work do you do?
I'm a teacher, and I love it! I get to work with kids all day long, and I love helping them learn.
That sounds like a great job! I'm sure you're a great teacher.
Thank you! I try my best.
It sounds like we have a lot in common! I'm sure we'd get along great.
